invocations.description: If level is not specified, returns the time left in minutes for the next level, based on the current exp rate (same as $timetonextlevel). Otherwise, returns the amount of time left in minutes for level level. Use the time function to convert into a legible time.
invocations.exDescription: Will print on the console the amount of time in minutes left before you achieve the next level, based on the current experience rate.
